ISSUE.TITLE: DeleteExpiredShoppingCartItems method doesn't publish delete event
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: The DeleteExpiredShoppingCartItems method in ShoppingCartService deletes some shopping cart items but, doesn't publish any event for deleted ones. It happens because this method uses the shopping cart item repository directly for deleting and doesn't use the DeleteShoppingCartItem method.

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Fixed problem with removing wrong cache key for GenericAttribute

COMMIT.MESSAGE: #4271 Publish event on delete expired shopping cart item
